name: The Human Who Reached lsekai
description:
• Hold down LMB(aka the paintwork, WHY???)/RMB(aka PCM); wait for the card to turn green; release; repeat.
  • You will lose if your health or sanity drops to zero.
  • Health and sanity are restored after each battle.
  • Health and sanity are reduced by enemy attacks.
  • Enemies attack when you have played 5 cards each from the right and left deck.
  • Enemies attack when the timer reaches zero, then it [timer] is restored.
  • Skip monologues on LMB/RMB.
  • Exit the game Alt+F4 or simply Esc.
  • There are 5 enemies in the game.
  • "Clouds" in paint.net is the best thing in ZA WARUDO.
  • The translation into English is made through Google, I'm kidding, through Yandex.Translate.
